comment: Coach Kelley, is nice and help you with your running skills but she is a tough grader and the final exam is hard for a 1 credit hour.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: It was an easy one credit class if you really looking to get in shape or just enjoy running. Mrs. Lowe is a runner herself and really passionate about it. She has cool stories to share and very inspirational. Just come to class and do the work and you will get an A.

If you want to go to the perch, swift Cantrell and do a majority of stuff off campus I recommend this class for you. The class is pretty simple. I personally would not have taken it because it was not an easy 1 credit hour A I was looking for.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Great teacher for this class. One of the best teachers I've had at KSU. She sounds mean on emails but when you meet her, you'll be surprised at how caring she is. As a person, she's straightforward and funny, too. She's always inspiring us with amusing anecdotes from her past and current experiences as a runner, mom, and wife. Take her if you can.
She is a great teacher and an easy grader. When I took the midterm, the assignment did not send to her and she gave me an extension to send it to her. She is a little humorous but a great person.
